content.title: Python Interpreter
content.description: The runtime environment that executes Python code. Python is an interpreted language with deterministic semantics for core operations.

content.title: JSON Data Format
content.description: JavaScript Object Notation - a lightweight data interchange format. Human-readable, language-independent, and supports objects, arrays, strings, numbers, booleans, and null.

content.title: JSONL Format
content.description: JSON Lines format - stores multiple JSON objects, one per line. Enables streaming and deterministic storage. Used extensively in Maven for data persistence.

content.title: API Contract
content.description: A formal specification of inputs, outputs, and behavior for an API. Contracts enable reliable integration and clear expectations between components.
